step.cmd: Select or deselect Include result value.
step.stepresult: If selected, each distinct result in the selected Result Sets will be printed in the report. Occurrences of identical result values will be counted in the same line.

step.cmd: Select or deselect Include metadata in result value when counting.
step.stepresult: If selected, results with distinct metadata (i.e. deletion, epenthesis, match, substitution) will be counted separately, even if the results appear to be the same.
